definitions.definition: Shirking or wandering from business or duty ; straying ; hence, idle ; loitering .
Of a student : absent from school without permission .
examples: He didn’t graduate because he was chronically truant and didn’t have enough attendances to meet the requirement.

definitions.definition: Having no real substance ; unimportant , vain , worthless .

main_definition: Shirking or wandering from business or duty ; straying ; hence, idle ; loitering .
secondary_definitions: ( specifically ) Of a student : absent from school without permission .
( obsolete ) Having no real substance ; unimportant , vain , worthless .
